mapper.select: select ta.active_id, ta.active_name, ta.begin_time, ta.end_time, ta.active_type, ta.stat, ta.is_all_join, ta.min_odr_num, ta.gift_num, ta.discount, ta.deleted from t_active ta, t_customer tc, t_active_area_grp taag, t_active_goods tag, t_goods tg where ta.stat = 1 and ta.is_all_join = 0 and tg.goods_id = #{goodsId} and DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') between ta.begin_time and ta.end_time and tg.goods_id = tag.goods_id and tag.active_id = ta.active_id and taag.active_id = ta.active_id and taag.area_grp_id in ( SELECT T2.area_grp_id FROM ( SELECT @r AS _id, (SELECT @r := pid FROM t_area_grp WHERE area_grp_id = _id) AS pid, @l := @l + 1 AS lvl FROM (SELECT @r := (SELECT TC.area_grp_id FROM t_customer TC WHERE TC.cust_id = #{custId}), @l := 0) vars, t_area_grp h WHERE @r <> 0) T1 JOIN t_area_grp T2 ON T1._id = T2.area_grp_id ORDER BY T1.lvl DESC ) group by ta.active_id union all select ta.active_id, ta.active_name, ta.begin_time, ta.end_time, ta.active_type, ta.stat, ta.is_all_join, ta.min_odr_num, ta.gift_num, ta.discount, ta.deleted from t_active ta where ta.stat = 1 and ta.is_all_join = 1 and DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') between ta.begin_time and ta.end_time

SELECT T2.area_grp_id FROM ( SELECT @r AS _id, (SELECT @r := pid FROM t_area_grp WHERE area_grp_id = _id) AS pid, @l := @l + 1 AS lvl FROM (SELECT @r := #{subAreaGrpId},@l := 0) vars, t_area_grp h WHERE @r <> 0) T1 JOIN t_area_grp T2 ON T1._id = T2.area_grp_id ORDER BY T1.lvl DESC
select from t_area_grp tag,t_emp_area_grp teag where tag.area_grp_id = teag.area_grp_id and teag.emp_id = #{empId}
